scripts.dev: npx --yes wrangler@latest pages dev public --kv=CACHE_KV --binding LOCAL=1 --d1 DB=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx --port 2000 --compatibility-date 2023-12-01 --compatibility-flags="nodejs_compat"
scripts.dev-kill: pid=$(lsof -t -i:2000 -c workerd); [ -n "$pid" ] && kill $pid && echo "PID $pid killed" || echo "Nothing to kill"
scripts.dev-migrations-list: npx wrangler d1 migrations list swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml
scripts.dev-migrations-apply: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml
scripts.dev-db-execute: npx wrangler d1 execute swiftace-db --local -c d1.toml
